status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine was predominantly not generating: 37 consecutive 10‑minute intervals were in “Downtime,” despite generally steady winds on average (mean 18.43 m/s, low variability) with an isolated extreme gust to 43.9 m/s. Measured power stayed low and tight (mean 0.962, std 0.050) and the negative mean power residual (-0.115) indicates sustained underperformance versus expectation, consistent with the “power_deficit” tag. Operating conditions included relatively high average pitch (16.35°), moderate mean yaw misalignment (7.88°), and a warm average temperature (64.81), with comparatively higher variability on the generator side (generator rpm std 56.85).
